nodes.text: Hallway 328 was a hallway on the Invisible Hand. During the Battle of Coruscant it was where Chancellor Palpatine, Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker were trapped by a ray shield. They were then surrounded by droid forces.
The non-canon deleted death scene of Shaak Ti took place in Hallway 328.
